title: TIRO PRIDE TRACK JACKET
detail: The 2022 adidas X Kris Andrew Small Pride Collection was inspired by the Stonewall Activists of the Stonewall Uprising in 1969. Together adidas and Kris Andrew Small offer a collection in solidarity & celebration of the LGBTQIA+ community's past & present, honouring unique belonging â€“ creating a colourful & diverse graphic message among this inclusive & optimistic collection. This partnership is also adjacent to adidas' two key Global Purpose Partners, Athlete Ally & Stonewall UK. Inspired by football. Embracing Pride. This adidas Tiro track jacket is part of a collaboration with Sydney-based artist Kris Andrew Small. Done up in the style of radical protest art, Small's bold graphics pop on the collar, arms and stylized adidas Badge of Sport on the back. Moisture-wicking AEROREADY and a slim fit make this top a comfortable option for on and off the pitch. Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
